load_pattern pattern_edges.txt pattern_node_labels.txt
match
add_vertex 1
add_vertex 2
add_vertex 3
add_vertex 1
add_vertex 2
set_vertex_label 0 2
set_vertex_label 1 3
set_vertex_label 2 1
set_vertex_label 5 2
set_vertex_label 10 3
delete_vertex 0
delete_vertex 1
delete_vertex 2
add_vertex 1
add_vertex 2
add_vertex 3
set_vertex_label 0 2
set_vertex_label 1 3
add_vertex 1
add_vertex 2
match
quit
